channel.title: [PI] questions

item.title: [PI] questions
item.dc:creator: @collin123456 collin123456
item.description:
@collin123456 wrote:

i have a few questions:

(1) how do i make it so if player has 99 in skill 22 he gets item 4315 (untrimmed) or 4317 (trimmed) from the skill cape shop?

(2) when i add a new item it goes into the wrong spot people said add the item id to item.java into the right array but its like this public static boolean playerCape(int itemId) { String[] data = { "cloak", "cape", "Cape", "attractor", "Attractor", "Ava's" }; String item = getItemName(itemId); if (item == null) { return false; } boolean item1 = false; for(int i = 0; i < data.length; i++ ) { if(item.endsWith(data[i]) || item.contains(data[i])) { item1 = true; } } return item1; }
and that confuses me, any help is appreciated

Read full topic
